topics.body:
HOLY FUCK!

You know how I go on and on about robots?  Well almost realistic sexbots are already for sale in Japan.  *Almost* realistic.  You're familiar with the uncanny valley?  Well the sexbots in question are almost out of the uncanny valley; you can tell that they're sexbots, but at first glance they look human.  They also have realistic feeling skin.

Inb4 Chobits style future.

*edit
Correction some of them have gotten out of the uncanny valley.
